alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 5:03AM MST until January 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 to 6 inches in valleys and 6 to 10 inches in mountains above 4000 feet. * WHERE...Mullan, Orin-Rice Road, Dobson Pass, Wauconda, Athol, Clark Fork, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Boulder Creek Road, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Deer Park, St. Maries, Tiger, Ione, Chesaw Road, Kettle Falls, Lookout Pass, Bonners Ferry, Fruitland, Chewelah, Kellogg, Fernwood, Springdale-Hunters Road, Pinehurst, Metaline, Eastport, Wallace, Osburn, Flowery Trail Road, Colville, Inchelium, Sherman Pass, Priest River, Newport, Northport, Sandpoint, Republic, Metaline Falls, and Fourth Of July Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions through the weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
